author: Zèë 
text: You matter. 🧚‍♂️

author: Zèë 
text: Even its your soulmate, it takes work. Even the relationship that are meant to be, take effort. Your soulmate is someone who actually wants to grow with you & fight for you. They don’t give up every time one little thing goes wrong. Keep loving.

author: Zèë 
text: One day distance will be worth it and we will be together every day.

author: Zèë 
text: She’s my lucky charm.🧚‍♂️

author: Zèë 
text:
Do you think you have a choice in
loving someone? The answer will always be. No. Your soul picks who you love & your heart seals the deal. How little a choice we have over such things when your heart knows what it wants & your soul knows when it's real.

author: Zèë 
text: Listen to your heart not to peoples opinion.

author: Zèë 
text: Loyalty behind your back is really top tier.

author: Zèë 
text: Be with someone who chooses you everyday over everyone.

text:
Calm, but alert. 
Relaxed, but ready. 
Smooth, but sharp. 
Humble, but confident.

text: Every time I look at you I fall in love with you all over again. 🧚‍♂️

author: Zèë 
text: You are enough.

author: Zèë 
text: Heartfelt respect to all the ladies preparing Iftar (especially frying samosas pakoras) in this heat plus the cooking temperatures which would be like hell fire. Sad how men just sit in cool rooms & just enjoy the feast. Take a bow ladies you deserve tons of appreciation🙏

author: Zèë 
text: Be with someone who says “WE”not you & me.

author: Zèë 
text: Friend calls me just before iftar it’s haleem evening at mosque Jaldi ponchooooo. 🤣 dost hon to aise.

author: Zèë 
text: Life begins when we decide to stop pleasing the audience.

author: Zèë 
text: Eid ho aur dheeer sari shopping na ho to mazza he nahi ata. Shop till you drop. 😬

author: Zèë 
text: I love how I get happy when I talk to you. ☺️

author: Zèë 
text: The first time I saw you my heart whispered she’s the one.

author: Zèë 
text: Marriage is not about just mehndi barat walima photo shoots. It’s about soul connection, being best friends, mutual respect, understanding, commitment, trust, responsibility, love, care & life long affection in thick & thin.

author: Zèë 
text:
Have a blessed Friday everyone. May all your prayers be accepted & forgiveness granted. May Allah bless us all with kindness, health, prosperity & generosity. Elahi Ameen. 🤲
Khush rehiay muskuratay rehiay apna aur unka khayal rakhiay. https://t.co/hz9u0ArYOB

author: Zèë 
text: Ya Allah reham on those who need your help. Listen to their silent hearts tonight. You are in the closet one. Help them cherish them take their pains & hardships away give them strength to endure. Bless them with peace & harmony. Elahi Ameen.🤲#LailatulQadr https://t.co/iMUNTJwCQA

author: Zèë 
text: Be with someone who brings sunlight to your heart. ❣️

author: Zèë 
text: Be with someone who treats you like you are the most beautiful thing that ever happened to him. 🧚‍♂️

author: Zèë 
text: Maturity is when you realise that the things that cost nothing, hold the most value.

author: Zèë 
text: Become the most positive & enthusiastic person you ever knew.

author: Zèë 
text: Choose your life partner carefully. This one decision will make 90% of your happiness or misery.

author: Zèë 
text: Be so private that they can’t do nothing only assume.

author: Zèë 
text: When I miss you I read our old texts & smile like crazy but it feels like heaven.

author: Zèë 
text: Real you is made by realisations.

author: Zèë 
text: One thing people need to understand about kindest, caring & loving folks. They survived hell & that’s what made them gentle they are not weak.

author: Zèë 
text:
No matter how you feel, 
get up, 
dress up, 
show up,
never give up.

author: Zèë 
text:
Be with someone who isn't afraid to admit that they miss you, knows that you're not perfect, but treats you as
if you are. One who gives their heart completely to you.

author: Zèë 
text: The Problem today people don't cherish good people, they just use them.

author: Zèë 
text: Yesterday met a friend after 3 years. Asked me what I have for iftar? Me, jo mil jai Apple dates banana. Him, matlab still single ho. Today door bell rings before iftar & it was him with all this. Such friends are blessings. 🤲 https://t.co/Z7EyUugKUP

author: Zèë 
text: Everybody fixing their bodies nobody fixing their souls.

author: Zèë 
text: Sometimes the ones closest to you are the ones you need to watch.

text: I don’t need a weapon I am One.
